metadata.synopsis: Narrator AD with some lore about the backstory of the mindflayers in the nautiloid
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with the illithid tablet in TUT_Avernus_C 51; 23; -407

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *Visions project into your mind: A nautiloid hurtling through the planes, resplendent with psionic energy.*
